• {{ error }}
import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { Errors } from './models'; @Component({ selector: 'app-list-errors', templateUrl: './list-errors.component.html' }) export class ListErrorsComponent { formattedErrors: Array = []; @Input() set errors(errorList: Errors) { this.formattedErrors = Object.keys(errorList.errors || {}) .map(key => `${key} ${errorList.errors[key]}`); } get errorList() { return this.formattedErrors; } }
